chapters.title: Chapter 18: A Narrow Passage
chapters.info: Chesmal Emry, p. 238—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah, a very talented Healer. She announced that Meilyn had died in her bed; this was not possible, since Siuan hid under the same bed, fell asleep there, and woke up the next morning to find that the bed had not been slept in. She is quite likely of the Black Ajah.
